name: astock-stockthumbs
description: Reference integration of Adobe Stock search results

scripts.build: babel src/sdk_stockthumbs.js --out-file dist/sdk_stockthumbs.min.js --source-maps && babel src --out-dir dist --copy-files && rm dist/*src.html && rm dist/*stockthumbs.js && cross-var tar -cvzf stockthumbs-$npm_package_version.zip dist/

author: cfsmith@adobe.com
